languages.text: Сгинувшая капитан ван Дейн в предсмертном послании просила забрать фамильные реликвии из тайника на Кьяве Гамма.

traits.locale_text: Сгинувшая капитан ван Дейн в предсмертном послании просила забрать фамильные реликвии из тайника на Кьяве Гамма.

languages.text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: Сгинувшая капитан ван Дейн в предсмертном послании просила забрать фамильные реликвии из тайника на Кьяве Гамма.

traits.locale_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.
Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.
Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.
Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: 冯·戴恩舰长在身亡前写下了最后一封邮件，希望有人能前往基亚瓦伽马星的藏匿处，取回她的家族遗物。
languages.original_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: 冯·戴恩舰长在身亡前写下了最后一封邮件，希望有人能前往基亚瓦伽马星的藏匿处，取回她的家族遗物。

languages.text: ヴァン・ダイン中隊長は、生前最後の派遣で、キアヴァ・ガンマの隠し場所から家族の遺物を回収するよう依頼していた。
languages.original_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: ヴァン・ダイン中隊長は、生前最後の派遣で、キアヴァ・ガンマの隠し場所から家族の遺物を回収するよう依頼していた。

languages.text: La capitana van Dayne solicitó en su último mensaje antes de morir que se recuperaran sus reliquias familiares de un alijo en Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: La capitana van Dayne solicitó en su último mensaje antes de morir que se recuperaran sus reliquias familiares de un alijo en Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: Captain van Dayne hat während ihres letzten Einsatzes kurz vor ihrem Tod die Bergung ihrer Familienrelikte aus einem Lager auf Kiava Gamma erbeten.
languages.original_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: Captain van Dayne hat während ihres letzten Einsatzes kurz vor ihrem Tod die Bergung ihrer Familienrelikte aus einem Lager auf Kiava Gamma erbeten.

languages.text: Avant de trouver la mort, la capitaine van Dayne a demandé dans sa dernière communication à ce que les reliques de sa famille soient récupérées dans une cache de Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: Avant de trouver la mort, la capitaine van Dayne a demandé dans sa dernière communication à ce que les reliques de sa famille soient récupérées dans une cache de Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: Kaptan van Dayne, hayatını kaybetmeden önce ilettiği son mesajında Kiava Gama'daki bir zuladan aile yadigârlarının alınmasını talep etti.
languages.original_text: Captain van Dayne, in her final dispatch before she perished, requested that her family relics be retrieved from a cache on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: Kaptan van Dayne, hayatını kaybetmeden önce çıktığı son görevinde, Kiava Gama'daki bir zuladan aile yadigârlarının alınmasını talep etti.
